frame.name: Ineffability
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Stimulus</fen> inspires a feeling of awe and interest in a (generally implicit or generic) <fen>Experiencer</fen> due to desirable qualities which are difficult to explain. Alternatively, the <fen>Attribute</fen> of the <fen>Stimulus</fen> may be described instead.
<ex><m>There is</m> a certain <t>je-ne-sais-quoi</t> <fex name="Stimulus">about that city</fex> .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Stimulus
FE.definition: <def-root>The entity which inspires a feeling of amazement at its exceptionality.</def-root>

FE.name: Experiencer
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Experiencer</fen> experiences the emotion brought about by the <fen>Stimulus</fen></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>An expression of how unusual the ineffability of the <fen>Stimulus</fen> is.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE marks expressions that indicate a set of conditions under which the <fen>Stimulus</fen> is able to bring about the emotion. </def-root>

FE.name: Parameter
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Parameter</fen> is the area in which the <fen>Stimulus</fen> brings about an effect on the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Comparison_set
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Comparison_set</fen> is the set of individuals the <fen>Stimulus</fen> is compared to when determining the <fen>Degree</fen> of the emotional reaction. </def-root>

FE.name: Property
FE.definition:
<def-root>A feature of the <fen>Stimulus</fen> which causes a particular experience.
<ex>That night was <t>magic</t> <fex name="Property">in every way</fex> .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Attribute
FE.definition:
<def-root>An expression of the attribute of ineffability.
<ex>She had a <t>magical</t> <fex name="Attribute">quality</fex> .</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: magic.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a mysterious and enchanting quality.

lexUnit.name: magic.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: a mysterious and enchanting quality.

lexUnit.name: magical.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: characterized by a a mysterious and enchanting quality.

lexUnit.name: ineffable.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: too great or extreme to be expressed in words

lexUnit.name: ineffability.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: being too great or extreme to be expressed in words

lexUnit.name: magicalness.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the condition or quality of having a mysterious and enchanting quality.
